title: Robert and Frank trade palm leaves, coconuts

content.question: The table above shows the maximum number of palm leaves or coconuts that Robert and Frank can pick respectively in a single day. Which of the following is true?

choices.label: Robert has a comparative advantage in picking coconuts.
Frank has a comparative advantage in picking palm leaves.
Robert and Frank can both benefit from trade with each other if 1 coconut is traded for 1 palm leaf.
Robert and Frank can both benefit from trade with each other if 1 coconut is traded for 3 palm leaves.
Robert and Frank can both benefit from trade with each other if 1 coconut is traded for 5 palm leaves.

content.answer: Robert and Frank can both benefit from trade with each other if 1 coconut is traded for 3 palm leaves.
